div.a: Five Reasons Apple Has Peaked - For Real, This Time

div.div: There is mounting evidence—of the sort that technologists understand but markets often miss—that Apple has lost the narrative that took it from death’s doorstep to world’s most valuable company by market capitalization.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TwBZy2&via=Digg&text=Five Reasons Apple Has Peaked - For Real, This Time

div.a: A Look Inside New York’s Underwater Subways

div.div: The submerged public transit system is awe-inspiring to look at. But what’s more important is what happens next time--because there will be a next time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vg8jHk&via=Digg&text=A Look Inside New York’s Underwater Subways

div.a: Leaked App Reveals Google Wallet's Physical Credit Card

div.div: Google Wallet may have recently undergone a massive transformation to allow all credit cards to work with the tap-to-pay app, but it also has something else up its sleeve.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UlAgIv&via=Digg&text=Leaked App Reveals Google Wallet's Physical Credit Card

div.div: YOU'RE GUARANTEED TO RUN THIS LIGHT

div.a: The Most Insane Traffic Light In The World

div.div: Stop? Go? Walk? Don't walk? I think I'll just turn the car off right now and have a little cry.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q73AXf&via=Digg&text=The Most Insane Traffic Light In The World

div.a: George Lucas To Donate Most Of His $4 Billion From Lucasfilm Sale To Education Charity

div.div: “I am dedicating the majority of my wealth to improving education. It is the key to the survival of the human race.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SdZqbO&via=Digg&text=George Lucas To Donate Most Of His $4 Billion From Lucasfilm Sale To Education Charity

div.div: THEY KNOW YOU'LL JUST WATCH THE MOVIE

div.a: Authors' Funniest Responses To The Film Adaptations Of Their Work

div.div: E. B. White: "The story is interrupted every few minutes so that somebody can sing a jolly song. I don’t care much for jolly songs...But that’s what you get for getting embroiled in Hollywood.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SeZf0j&via=Digg&text=Authors' Funniest Responses To The Film Adaptations Of Their Work

div.a: These Guys' $5K Spending Sprees Keep Your Games Free

div.div: “For most publishers out there … a handful of players make up a significant percentage of revenue."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uk4HyG&via=Digg&text=These Guys' $5K Spending Sprees Keep Your Games Free

div.div: SHOULDA PICKED A COSTUME WITH RAIN BOOTS

div.a: World's Worst Walks Of Shame Happening Right Now

div.div: Witnessed the morning after Halloween, at the corner of Houston and Avenue A, in Manhattan's powerless dead zone: a woman in a full-on Superwoman costume, hailing a cab that she will likely have to share.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q929aW&via=Digg&text=World's Worst Walks Of Shame Happening Right Now

div.a: Check Out This Russian Beard Tax Token

div.div: It used to be a lot more expensive to maintain a beard.

div.a: Man Beats Robot Car On Race Track

div.div: A race between a robot car and a human has ended with a win for the humans - but only just.

div.div: The following will come as good news to those in Mitt Romney’s camp who’ve been wanting him to shore up the geriatric-billionaire vote.

div.div: THE FORCE IS ONLY WORTH SO MUCH

div.a: Why Buzz Lightyear Is Worth Billions More Than Han Solo

div.div: Why was Pixar almost 13 years ago worth so much more than Lucasfilm is today?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VFm51T&via=Digg&text=Why Buzz Lightyear Is Worth Billions More Than Han Solo

div.a: Why Does Salt Water Make Hurricane Damage So Much Worse?

div.div: The white stuff can stick around and ruin, well, pretty much everything. That puts the officials trying to fix it on a ticking clock.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U0YWLN&via=Digg&text=Why Does Salt Water Make Hurricane Damage So Much Worse?

div.div: JUST STICK WITH THE DIET COKE

div.a: How Much Exercise Does It Take To Burn Off A Can Of Coke

div.div: Coca-Cola has put out a calculator that tells you how much of what kind of physical activity is required to burn the equivalent of a can of coke.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NuJR1o&via=Digg&text=How Much Exercise Does It Take To Burn Off A Can Of Coke

div.a: Sumo Recruitment Hits 54-Year Low In Japan

div.div: The Japanese sport of sumo is counting the cost of a string of scandals, attracting the smallest number of young recruits for more than half a century.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tbnf5c&via=Digg&text=Sumo Recruitment Hits 54-Year Low In Japan

div.div: THAT'S A LOT OF MARBLE RYE
"Seinfeld" might be the show about nothing, but it's also made an incredible $2.7 billion -- with a "b" -- since it went off the air 12 years ago, according to Time Warner, which owns the series.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/dagzpJ&via=Digg&text='Seinfeld' Rakes In Billions

div.a: In The Future, Tankers Could Have 20-Story Sails

div.div: An entrepreneur plans to fit 80 meter wingsails on cargo ships – in other words, a sail of about 20 floors in order to reduce the carbon footprint of tankers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TWOxk4&via=Digg&text=In The Future, Tankers Could Have 20-Story Sails

div.a: This Is (Part Of) The Bus Line To Get To Manhattan

div.div: As expected, public transportation is a mess in New York City following Hurricane Sandy. And you thought your commute was a nightmare.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TwGOao&via=Digg&text=This Is (Part Of) The Bus Line To Get To Manhattan

div.div: WHAT'S THE DEAL WITH THE SUNGLASSES?
You've heard their policies, but what about the other questions? Like what's that jabbing gesture Obama makes with his thumb? And why are "Mr. President" and "Mr. Speaker" titles kept for life?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pn3FEQ&via=Digg&text=10 U.S. Election Quirks Explained

div.div: YOU DON'T HAVE TO DRINK IT THOUGH

div.a: Why You Should Respect Light Beer

div.div: For all the punch lines, brewing light beers actually requires a great deal of craftsmanship.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TwK7hY&via=Digg&text=Why You Should Respect Light Beer

div.a: Seven New Yorkers On How The Hurricane Tested Their Love Lives

div.div: As New Yorkers emerge from their homes in the wake of Hurricane Sandy, they find themselves with messes to clean, power lines to repair — and new sex partners, the inevitable outcome of a citywide event involving darkened apartments lit only by candles. Seven hurricane lovers tell their stories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SvTL4s&via=Digg&text=Seven New Yorkers On How The Hurricane Tested Their Love Lives

div.div: I am Nimrod Kamer, aka Peter Rehnquist, the creator of the "real" Obama Kenya Birth 2012 film.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ToFUZa&via=Digg&text=How I Faked Obama's Kenyan Birth

div.a: Meet The Men Who Are Building The Millenium Falcon

div.div: Already a multi-year project, a group of makers in Tennessee have embarked on a mission to build a full-scale Millennium Falcon using 3-D printers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RjUp0v&via=Digg&text=Meet The Men Who Are Building The Millenium Falcon

div.div: With the superstorm now dissipating, estimates of its economic impact are beginning to emerge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RvT0Gc&via=Digg&text=The Costs To Come

div.a: Mysterious Docs Found In Meth House Reveal The Inner Workings Of Dark Money Group

div.div: Think outside groups aren't coordinating their ad campaigns with the candidates they support? A cache of documents found in a meth house in Montana may tell a different story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S7hnZT&via=Digg&text=Mysterious Docs Found In Meth House Reveal The Inner Workings Of Dark Money Group

div.div: HE SHOULD JUST JUDO CHOP THE LIMP

President Vladimir Putin has retreated to his country house, and, no, it’s not because of his health, his spokesman said Thursday, but, yes, he has a lingering “sports injury,” but, no, it’s nonsense to think it’s forcing him to change his schedule.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SyX4Ib&via=Digg&text=Putin's Limp Raises Health Questions

div.div: CAN LYDIA CALLIS DO A LIVE SIGNING OF THIS?

div.a: NYC Mayor Bloomberg Endorses Obama To Lead On Climate Change

div.div: Citing Hurricane Sandy, Mayor Bloomberg endorsed President Obama to lead on climate change.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U1nBjh&via=Digg&text=NYC Mayor Bloomberg Endorses Obama To Lead On Climate Change

div.a: Apple Shake-Up Could Lead To Design Shift

div.div: Whether they realize it or not, all of those who swipe a finger down from the top of the iPhone’s screen to check for notifications are bearing witness to a big sore point within Apple.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QVp6vd&via=Digg&text=Apple Shake-Up Could Lead To Design Shift

div.a: Mayor Booker Lets Sandy Victim Hang Out At His House

div.div: This morning, a Twitter user with the handle @my_serenelove who identifies herself as a “Newark native” on the site sent a message to Mayor Booker complaining about her situation in the aftermath of the storm. Mayor Booker replied by inviting her over to his house to use the electricity, “relax” and watch DVD’s.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SzG2sq&via=Digg&text=Mayor Booker Lets Sandy Victim Hang Out At His House
